summary: Compiler setup for GNAT (inactive, replaced by vimscript#1609)
name: compilergnat.vim
description:
This plugin is superseded by vimscript#1609.

Compiler setup for the GNAT [1] compiler.

Reports errors to: http://code.google.com/p/vim-scripts/issues/list
Discuss improvements on: http://groups.google.com/group/vim_scripts

[1] http://gnuada.sourceforge.net
install_details: into the compiler directory with it

versions.release_notes:
New coordinated release for all Ada plugins. Binary releases which are patched with all Ada plugins is available from the GNU Ada project [1]

[1] http://gnuada.sourceforge.net
